newsitem.title: USA: Brooks Fiber expands pact with AT&T.
newsitem.headline: Brooks Fiber expands pact with AT&T.

text.p: Brooks Fiber Properties Inc said Thursday it expanded its contractual relationship with AT&T Corp in an agreement that allows for Brooks to provide AT&T dedicated access services in six additional cities over its networks.
The agreement includes Salt Lake City, Utah; Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minn.; Portland, Maine, and Manchester and Nashua, N.H. Specifics of the agreement were not disclosed.
Brooks is a nationwide provider of local telecommunications services.
